Supports playback of .mp4 files from local storage, unsecured SMB shares and from UPnP ContentDiscovery capable media servers. Local files uses a flat file listing while UPnP/SMB sources retains whatever folder och category structure the Media Server is using. mkv containers are also playable if the codecs used are supported by the Chromecast. Please note that the Chromecast does not support AC3 audio which is frequently used in mkv containers.
